text: Chocoladefabriken Lindt & Sprüngli AG, more commonly known as Lindt, is a Swiss chocolate and confectionery company. It was founded in 1845 and known for its chocolate truffles and chocolate bars, among other sweets. == Other websites == * Lindt official website Category:19th-century establishments in Switzerland Category:1845 establishments in Europe Category:Swiss chocolate companies
title: Lindt & Sprüngli
